promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a young basic elephant normal-type wearing diamond armor. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or normal. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Armordillo, a young basic elephant normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: sharpen, extreme-evoboost. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word elephant or normal or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, elephant-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, faded prismatic bokeh background
